Title: Relates to modifications and exceptions to case payment reimbursement rates for neoplastic disease care hospitals
Summary: Provides per diem rates of payment by governmental agencies for inpatient services provided by facilities designated by the federal department of health and human services as exempt extended neoplastic disease care hospitals.
LawCode: Amd ยง2807-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to rates of hospital reimbursement for facilities designated by the federal department of health and human services as exempt extended neoplastic disease care hospitals
